meta.name: Name of the list, displayed in the settings UI. Required.
curators: By convention, this first entry should be the original creator of the list.
This second entry should be the current lead curator.
Followed by the other persons who verify reports and/or otherwise manage entries.
meta.label: The text displayed as label next to a user's name. Should be as short as possible. Required.
meta.msg: The text displayed on profile pages of users. Provides more detail. Required.
meta.color: The color to use for the label and msg text. Any valid CSS color value. Required.
meta.homepage: The main (info) or support page of the list.
meta.reportType: How to report users to the curators. See docs. If not using reports, remove all report* keys.
meta.reportTarget: The URL to use for programmatic reports. See docs.
meta.reportData: Special data required by reportType. See docs.

a supported platform, lowercase.name: The username/handle. Do not use display name!
a supported platform, lowercase.id: The main ID used on the platform
a supported platform, lowercase.custom+: Other possibly useful IDs or info can be added as keys for future use. Optional.

a supported platform, lowercase.name: This data can be found through reports (during reporting, and as the result of sending).
a supported platform, lowercase.id: Lists not using programmatic reports can use the export functionality.
